name: Tower of Almost Everything
description:
This is a game made for the #WeeklyGameJam #WGJGame (Week 100, Theme: '100').

Note: this game is far from finished, right now, it's an early prototype. If you want me to make it into a full game, join my Discord and tell me so!

A greedy person gets sent to the Tower of Almost Everything. This person just happens to be you. Can you survive?
